configuration.content:
Welcome to InfoAlameda

This map room was designed to connect our community with information for action and change.

To use this mapping system,you must agree to the following conditions:

I have read, understood, and agree to the InfoAlamedaCounty legal disclaimer. Click here to access the legal disclaimer

No fees may be charged for use or distribution of InfoAlamedaCounty data or output. All persons are granted a limited license to use and distribute these data and products. You may not charge a fee for the data if you distribute it to others.

Cite InfoAlamedaCounty appropriately.Publications, presentations, and research reports based on data from the InfoAlamedaCounty database, must cite it appropriately. Click here for our protocol.

We request that users send us citations to publications, research reports, media articles, or educational material making use of the data of products on InfoAlamedaCounty. Please send your citations to Research Director.

Use InfoAlamedaCounty for GOOD -- never for EVIL

(Our Map Room was built using technology generously donated by ESRI)
configuration.btnlabel: I agree to the terms of use
